text: Last week, model and former BAZAAR cover girl Kate Upton revealed she was pregnant via a nonchalant Instagram post. Now, the mother - to - be has put her bump on full display at the Maxim Hot 100 party in Los Angeles, celebrating her latest cover for the magazine alongside her husband, Justin Verlander. Kate opted for a form - fitting embellished dress with a high neck and long sleeves, pairing the look with wrap - up black sandals and a dramatic statement earring.
